message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $120. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  How about $100? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can meet you in the middle at $110. I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to make a profit on this deal.
